title: Waiting for the Drop
description: Listen in as Judge John rules on metal meat utensils, 40 year olds listening to EDM, Vlad the Impaler-based religions, and the proper order to listen to podcasts. This week with Bailiff Jesse Thorn!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
